attributes.action: Memorial to all casualties of conflict in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Those who support this petition call for the creation of a national memorial to all who have been killed, civilian and military, in the struggle BOTH for AND against Irish independence, especially those who have been killed since 1900.

We believe that a civil memorial honouring both sides of the conflict should seek to provide a symbol pointing towards the yearning for reconciliation between both traditions.

We call for this Memorial to be located either in the UK national capital or in Northern Ireland.
